  • counterfit.commands.docs

Source code for counterfit.commands.docs

import subprocess
from subprocess import DEVNULL, STDOUT
from counterfit.core.output import CFPrint



[docs]def do_docs(self, args):
    try:
        subprocess.Popen(["python", "docs/server.py"],
                         stdout=DEVNULL, stderr=STDOUT)
        CFPrint.success("started server on http://127.0.0.1:5000/index.html")
    except Exception as e:
        CFPrint.error(f"Failed to start server: {e}")
